summary: THIS IS THE SECOND TIME IN ONE MONTH THAT I HAVE TAKEN MY 2002 VW JETTA WAGON IN FOR REPAIR FOR THE IGNITION COIL PROBLEM. HOW CAN A CAR MANUFACTURER ALLOW SOMEONE TO DRIVE AROUND IN A UNSAFE VEHICLE ESPECIALLY WHEN YOU OR THE DEALER CAN NOT PREDICT WHEN THIS WILL HAPPEN NEXT? THIS PROBLEM NEEDS TO BE RESOLVED, BUT THE CORPORATIONS ALWAYS WIN.
